name: Animal Wooden Puzzle - Riddles
description:
The animal puzzle game is the ideal application for your children. It is a virtual version of the classic wooden puzzles, kids game of matching forms which improves eye-hand coordination and motor skills. App includes a wide variety of animal images.
Your kid will learn different animal shapes and have fun playing with colorful puzzles. This is the classic, educational puzzles for already very young kids. It is an easy game that every kid can play because it does not have menus or unnecessary options that can make a kid loose his or her attention. Just put forms that appears at the bottom of the screen in the corresponding place. Once they are there, kid will see a reward animation that will serve a lot of motivation for him or her to continue playing.
Characteristics:
• Easy navigation between puzzles
• Easily manageable puzzle pieces
• Attractive high-quality graphics
• Soft and stimulating sounds
With these wooden silhouettes puzzles kid must add puzzle pieces in the corresponding place and learn to recognize shapes while discovering different animals. Thanks to its pedagogical component, this game will help your child to develop skills of association, tactile and motor skills. Kid dragging and manipulating the puzzles with a finger will develop motor skills, the ability that is the first, most basic and the most important to develop for kid in the kinder garden. Kid will learn useful skills while having fun playing this animal puzzle game! The Animal puzzles is a perfect complement for kids in preschools and school (from 3 to 5 years of age).
